awd_titl_txt: Sensor Fabrication by Enzyme Entrapment in Polymer Films    at Electrode Surface
awd_abstract_narration: The intent of this proposal is to                                               address critical issues concerning                                              the commercialization of enzyme                                                 electrode technology by carrying                                                out research into electrodes                                                    modified with enzyme/ion exchange                                               polymer films.  A basic                                                         understanding of the factors that                                               affect the characteristics of this                                              type of enzyme electrode is also                                                sought.  The proposed research will                                             seek to assess the relative merits                                              of different types of                                                           ion-exchangers for enzyme electrode                                             design, and will develop new                                                    techniques for achieving electrical                                             communication between immobilized                                               enzymes and electrodes.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Technology, Innovation, and Partnerships
